metadata.methodology: Synthetic baselines based on COBOL program complexity analysis
metadata.environment: Baseline estimates for CICS COBOL programs
notes: Baselines generated from analysis of COBOL source code (lines of code, operation complexity)
CRECUST includes 3-second async credit agency integration delay
XFRFUN includes atomic dual-account update overhead
DELCUS includes cascade delete of all customer accounts
All programs measured under simulated load conditions

programs.name: INQCUST
programs.description: Customer inquiry - simple DB2 read operation

programs.name: CRECUST
programs.description: Customer create with async credit agency integration (3 second wait)

programs.name: DELCUS
programs.description: Customer delete with cascade to all associated accounts

programs.name: INQACC
programs.description: Account inquiry - DB2 read with composite key

programs.name: INQACCCU
programs.description: Account inquiry for customer - cursor/pagination support

programs.name: CREACC
programs.description: Account create with Named Counter enqueue/dequeue

programs.name: UPDACC
programs.description: Account update - type, interest rate, overdraft modifications

programs.name: DELACC
programs.description: Account delete with PROCTRAN audit logging

programs.name: XFRFUN
programs.description: Transfer funds - atomic dual-account updates with validation

programs.name: DBCRFUN
programs.description: Debit/Credit funds - account balance update with PROCTRAN
